sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO hc_mscode(msTier, masterCd, masterNm) VALUES(1, #masterCd#, #masterNm#)
INSERT INTO hc_dtcode(masterCd, detailCd, detailNm) VALUES(#masterCd#,#detailCd#, #detailNm#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY m.masterCd, d.detailCd ASC) as no ,m.masterCd ,m.masterNm ,d.detailCd ,d.detailNm from hc_mscode AS m INNER JOIN hc_dtcode AS d ON m.masterCd = d.masterCd )hc_mscode
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY masterCd ASC) AS rownum, * from hc_mscode;
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY masterCd, detailCd ASC) as no ,masterCd ,detailCd ,detailNm from hc_dtcode )hc_detailCd
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hc_mscode as m INNER JOIN hc_dtcode as d ON m.masterCd = d.masterCd
SELECT dtNo, masterCd, detailCd, detailNm FROM hc_dtcode WHERE detailNm = #detailNm#
sqlMap.update: update hc_dtcode set masterCd = #masterCd#, detailCd = #detailCd#, detailNm = #detailNm# WHERE dtNo = #dtNo#
